item.title: Open Resource for 2019-NCoV
item.description: 🧬 Genomic sequence Reference genome Genebank ID (NCBI): MN908947 Genome resource NCBI 官方整理数据： GeneBank 中科院 2019 新型冠状病毒资源库（NGDC）: example 病毒株名 序列号 数据来源 相关 ID 序列完整度 2019-nCoV WHU01 MN988668 GenBank EPI_ISL_406716 Complete 2019-nCoV/USA-CA1/2020 MN994467 GenBank EPI_ISL_406034 Complete 2019-nCoV/USA-CA2/2020 MN994468 GenBank EPI_ISL_406036 Complete BetaCoV/Foshan/20SF207/2020 EPI_ISL_406534 GISAID Complete BetaCoV/Foshan/20SF210/2020 EPI_ISL_406535 GISAID Complete … 2019-nCoV_HKU-SZ-007c_2020 MN975268 GenBank Partial/gene level 2019-nCoV_HKU-SZ-007c_2020 MN975265 GenBank Partial/gene level more info (update in 2020-02-02 03:14)
